description.en:
Bytom is a blockchain protocol for financial and digital asset applications. Using the Bytom protocol, individuals and enterprises alike can register and exchange not just digital assets (i.e. Bitcoin) but traditional assets as well (i.e. securities, bonds, or even intelligence data). Bytom’s mission is “to bridge the atomic [physical] world and the byte [digital] world, to build a decentralized network where various byte assets and atomic assets could be registered and exchanged.”

Bytom is an interactive protocol of multiple byte assets, to give it the proper title. Heterogeneous byte-assets (indigenous digital currency, digital assets) that operate in different forms on the Bytom Blockchain and atomic assets (warrants, securities, dividends, bonds, intelligence information, forecasting information and other information that exist in the physical world) can be registered, exchanged, gambled and engaged in other more complicated and contract-based interoperations via Bytom.

While Ethereum’s SEC scrutinization as a possible security took the entire crypto market on a downturn in early 2018, Bytom voluntarily submitted to the SEC’s Howey Test and Bytom cryptocurrency was deemed not a security under its DAO watch. This one has potential to make an impact on the cryptocurrency market with low transaction fees, high tech Bytom blockchain technology and an interactive protocol of multiple byte assets that could mark it apart. A Bytom wallet is also on offer and can store plenty more than Bytom coins.

description.zh:
比原链（Bytom）是一种多样性比特资产的区块链交互协议，运行在比原链上的不同类型资产（收益权、非上市股权、债权、数字货币等）可以通过该协议进行交换、对赌和基于智能合约的复杂性交互操作。

比原链代币（BTM） 有什么用途？

比原币（BTM）是比原链上的原生资产，比原币的价值起源是其能够方便地表征和度量比原链上数字化经济活动。比原币的价值基于两点：一是使用比原链上的应用需要消耗一定量的比原币作为燃料；二是持有比原币，能够参与到比原链治理。
description.zh-tw:
比原鏈（Bytom）是一種多樣性比特資產的區塊鏈交互協議，運行在比原鏈上的不同類型資產（收益權、非上市股權、債權、數字貨幣等）可以通過該協議進行交換、對賭和基於智能合約的複雜性交互操作。

比原鏈代幣（BTM） 有什麼用途？

比原幣（BTM）是比原鏈上的原生資產，比原幣的價值起源是其能夠方便地表徵和度量比原鏈上數字化經濟活動。比原幣的價值基於兩點：一是使用比原鏈上的應用需要消耗一定量的比原幣作為燃料；二是持有比原幣，能夠參與到比原鏈治理。
description.ko:
블록체인기반의 다중 자산 프로토콜
주식, 배당, 채권, 부동산 계약 등의 실존 자산을 디지털 자산화 하여 자산을 안전하고 빠르게 사용할 수 있게 서비스하는 플랫폼
빠른 거래를 위한 UTXO적용

가치

설립자는 유명 암호화폐 포탈인 8BTC설립자이며 Alibaba, Alipay 출신의 엔지니어들이 대거 참여해 우수한 개발팀으로 주목을 받고 있습니다.
실존 자산을 디지털 자산으로 변환하여 이를 더 빠르고 안전하게 처리할 수 있는 플랫폼인 만큼 그 안정성이 어느 정도 입증이 되고 나면 고액의 거래를 더 쉽게 처리 할 수 있는 환경을 제공해 줌으로써 각광을 받을 것으로 예측 되는 종목 중 하나입니다.
description.ar:
Bytom is a blockchain protocol for financial and digital asset applications. Using the Bytom protocol, individuals and enterprises alike can register and exchange not just digital assets (i.e. Bitcoin) but traditional assets as well (i.e. securities, bonds, or even intelligence data). Bytom’s mission is “to bridge the atomic [physical] world and the byte [digital] world, to build a decentralized network where various byte assets and atomic assets could be registered and exchanged.”

Bytom is an interactive protocol of multiple byte assets, to give it the proper title. Heterogeneous byte-assets (indigenous digital currency, digital assets) that operate in different forms on the Bytom Blockchain and atomic assets (warrants, securities, dividends, bonds, intelligence information, forecasting information and other information that exist in the physical world) can be registered, exchanged, gambled and engaged in other more complicated and contract-based interoperations via Bytom.

While Ethereum’s SEC scrutinization as a possible security took the entire crypto market on a downturn in early 2018, Bytom voluntarily submitted to the SEC’s Howey Test and Bytom cryptocurrency was deemed not a security under its DAO watch. This one has potential to make an impact on the cryptocurrency market with low transaction fees, high tech Bytom blockchain technology and an interactive protocol of multiple byte assets that could mark it apart. A Bytom wallet is also on offer and can store plenty more than Bytom coins.

description.no:
Bytom is a blockchain protocol for financial and digital asset applications. Using the Bytom protocol, individuals and enterprises alike can register and exchange not just digital assets (i.e. Bitcoin) but traditional assets as well (i.e. securities, bonds, or even intelligence data). Bytom’s mission is “to bridge the atomic [physical] world and the byte [digital] world, to build a decentralized network where various byte assets and atomic assets could be registered and exchanged.”

Bytom is an interactive protocol of multiple byte assets, to give it the proper title. Heterogeneous byte-assets (indigenous digital currency, digital assets) that operate in different forms on the Bytom Blockchain and atomic assets (warrants, securities, dividends, bonds, intelligence information, forecasting information and other information that exist in the physical world) can be registered, exchanged, gambled and engaged in other more complicated and contract-based interoperations via Bytom.

While Ethereum’s SEC scrutinization as a possible security took the entire crypto market on a downturn in early 2018, Bytom voluntarily submitted to the SEC’s Howey Test and Bytom cryptocurrency was deemed not a security under its DAO watch. This one has potential to make an impact on the cryptocurrency market with low transaction fees, high tech Bytom blockchain technology and an interactive protocol of multiple byte assets that could mark it apart. A Bytom wallet is also on offer and can store plenty more than Bytom coins.
